datafield.subfield: Making money is killing your business, c2010:

t.p. (Chuck Blakeman) p. 267 (lifetime business practitioner who now uses his experience to help business owners create success; he speaks and works with businesses in the U.S., Europe, Africa, and Australia; his company, The Crankset Group, provides outcomebased mentoring, peer advisory, and consulting for business owners, CEOs, and their growing businesses)
